mapper.select: SELECT pr.seq AS ifprSeq ,pr.category ,pr.title ,pr.star ,pr.price ,pr.stock FROM product pr WHERE 1=1 AND mainYn = 1 AND pr.category = #{category} ;

SELECT pr.seq as ifprSeq ,pr.category ,pr.title ,pr.star ,pr.price ,pr.stock ,pr.uploadDate ,pro.optionMain ,group_concat(pro.optionSub separator ',') AS 'optionSub' from product pr left JOIN productOption pro ON pr.seq = pro.product_seq WHERE 1=1 AND pr.category = #{category} group by product_seq ;

SELECT pr.seq as ifprSeq ,pr.category ,pr.title ,pr.star ,pr.price ,pr.stock ,pr.uploadDate ,pro.optionMain ,group_concat(pro .optionSub separator ',') AS 'optionSub' from product pr LEFT JOIN productOption pro ON pr.seq = pro.product_seq WHERE 1=1 AND pr.seq = #{ifprSeq} group by product_seq ;

SELECT re.seq as ifprReviewSeq ,mm.id ,pr.title ,re.content as ifprReviewContent ,re.regDate as ifprReviewRegDate from review re left join product pr ON pr.seq = re.product_seq inner JOIN member mm ON mm.seq = re.member_seq where 1=1 AND product_seq = #{ifprSeq} ;

SELECT qa.seq as ifprQaSeq ,qa.answerYn ,mm.id ,qa.member_seq ,pr.title ,qa.product_seq ,qa.ifprQaTitle ,qa.content as ifprQaContent ,qa.regdate as ifprQaRegDate from qa qa inner JOIN member mm ON mm.seq = qa.member_seq INNER JOIN product pr ON pr.seq = qa.product_seq where 1=1 AND product_seq = #{ifprSeq} AND member_seq = #{shSeq} ;
SELECT seq ,type ,defaultNy ,sort ,path ,originalName ,uuidName ,delYn ,pseq FROM productUploaded WHERE 1=1 AND delYn = 0 AND pseq = #{ifprSeq} ORDER BY type, sort
